title: Linux locale Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux locale command and its practical applications. Learn how to understand locales, examine available locales, and change the system locale to observe its impact.

meta.title: Linux locale Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux locale command and its practical applications. Learn how to understand locales, examine available locales, and change the system locale to observe its impact.
meta.keywords: Linux, locale, system configuration, localization, internationalization, language settings

verify.name: Verify the current locale settings
verify.hint: The current locale settings should be en_US.UTF-8. Please check the output of the 'locale' command and ensure that the LANG environment variable is set to en_US.UTF-8.

steps.title: Explore the Available Locales on the System

verify.name: Verify the available locales
verify.hint: The en_US.UTF-8 locale should be available on the system. Please check the output of the 'locale -a' command and ensure that the en_US.UTF-8 locale is listed.

steps.title: Change the System Locale and Observe the Impact

verify.name: Verify the locale change
verify.hint: The system locale should be set back to en_US.UTF-8 after the final step. Please check the output of the 'locale' command and ensure that the LANG environment variable is set to en_US.UTF-8.
